Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: disableBlur
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Disable blurred background by setting this property to true.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: enableDarkMode
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Sets the blur style to dark theme which is applied before all other customization options. Light blur is used as standard.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: foregroundColor
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Sets the color of the foreground. If nil the standard color will be used.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customLightFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the font name of your light font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customRegularFontName

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customMediumFontName

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customBoldFontName

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customItalicFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your regular italic font used within the application.

Protocols/JumioAppearance.html.name: JumioAppearance
Protocols/JumioAppearance.html.abstract: Protocol that is used for all UI Objects to be customized via UIAppearance

Classes/JumioBaseView.html.name: JumioBaseView
Classes/JumioBaseView.html.abstract: Base class which is used to set our SDK via UIAppearance pattern

Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html.name: JumioNegativeButton
Classes/JumioNegativeButton.html.abstract: UIButton that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used within our confirmation or error views and invokes a negative action (e.g. cancel, retry).

Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html.name: JumioPositiveButton
Classes/JumioPositiveButton.html.abstract: UIButton that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used within our confirmation or error views and invokes a positive action (e.g. readable, OK).

Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.name: JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView
Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.abstract: UIView that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used to define the uiimage that is - when set - drawn instead of the NavigationBar title.

Classes/JumioDeviceInfo.html.name: JumioDeviceInfo
Classes/JumioDeviceInfo.html.abstract: NSObject that holds information about the device.

DocumentVerification%20Appearance.html#/.name: DocumentVerificationBaseView
DocumentVerification%20Appearance.html#/.abstract: Base class which is used to set our SDK via UIAppearance pattern

DocumentVerification%20Appearance.html#/.name: DocumentVerificationNegativeButton
DocumentVerification%20Appearance.html#/.abstract: UIButton that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used within our confirmation or error views and invokes a negative action (e.g. cancel, retry).

DocumentVerification%20Appearance.html#/.name: DocumentVerificationPositiveButton
DocumentVerification%20Appearance.html#/.abstract: UIButton that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used within our confirmation or error views and invokes a positive action (e.g. readable, OK).

Protocols/DocumentVerificationViewContro.name: -documentVerificationViewController:didFinishWithScanReference:
Protocols/DocumentVerificationViewContro.abstract: Called when the SDK finished with success.

Protocols/DocumentVerificationViewContro.name: -documentVerificationViewController:didFinishWithError:
Protocols/DocumentVerificationViewContro.abstract: Called when the SDK finished with error.

Protocols/DocumentVerificationViewContro.name: DocumentVerificationViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/DocumentVerificationViewContro.abstract: Protocol that has to be implemented when using DocumentVerificationViewController

Classes/DocumentVerificationError.html#/.name: code
Classes/DocumentVerificationError.html#/.abstract: A 6-digit alpha-numeric code. The first letter (A-Z) represents the error case. The remaining characters are represented by numbers that contain information helping us understand the problem situation.

Classes/DocumentVerificationError.html#/.name: message
Classes/DocumentVerificationError.html#/.abstract: The human readable localized description. Localization can be adapted in our Localizable-Netverify.strings and it’s translations.

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: apiToken
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: The API token of your Jumio merchant account

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: dataCenter
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: Specifiy the DataCenter that should be used

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: country
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: Specify a country the (format: ISO 3166-1 Alpha 3 code)

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: customerInternalReference
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: Identify the scan in the Jumio merchant UI. (Maximum characters: 100)

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: userReference
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: Specifies how the user is registered on your system. For example, you can use an email address, user name, or account number. Optional. (Maximum characters: 100)

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: callbackUrl
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: Callback URL (max. 255 characters) for the confirmation after the verification is completed.

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: reportingCriteria
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: Criteria for filtering in Merchant reports (Maximum characters: 255)

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: customDocumentCode
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: Criteria for filtering in Merchant reports (Maximum characters: 255)

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: cameraPosition
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: One of the Custom Document Type Codes as configurable the in Merchant UI.

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: documentName
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: Overrides the label for the document name

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: statusBarStyle
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: Configure the status bar style for the duration DocumentVerificationViewController is presented

Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.name: DocumentVerificationConfiguration
Classes/DocumentVerificationConfiguratio.abstract: Document Verification Settings class that is used to configure all available functional settings of DocumentVerificationViewController.

Classes/DocumentVerificationError.html.name: DocumentVerificationError
Classes/DocumentVerificationError.html.abstract: Model class that describes an error situation with a code and a message. Please always include the whole code when filing an error related issue to our support team. Please find more information in our Mobile SDK Github Guides at https://github.com/Jumio/mobile-sdk-ios/blob/master/docs/integration_document-verification.md#error .

Classes/DocumentVerificationViewControll.name: DocumentVerificationViewController
Classes/DocumentVerificationViewControll.abstract: Handles setup and presentation of the DocumentVerification Mobile SDK.
